song.title: The More I Seek You
song.lyrics:
[V] .D The more I seek You .A The more I find You || .Bm The more I find You .G The more I love You
[C] .D I wanna sit at your feet .A Drink from the cup in Your hands .Bm Lay back against You and breathe .G Feel Your heart beat || .D This love is so deep .A It's more than I can stand .Bm I melt in Your peace .G It's overwhelming
